title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.7 - Aircraft to clear active runways during emergency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1261.7 - Aircraft to clear active runways during emergency

State Regulations

During an emergency, all aircraft shall clear active
runways and shall hold their positions unless otherwise directed by the control
tower. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1261.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
